{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''''inzil''''' is an [[Adûnaic]] word meaning "flower, lily".<ref>{{PE|19}}, p. 99</ref>
==Etymology==
''inzil'' is similar to [[Valarin]] ''[[iniðil]]'' and [[Quenya]] ''[[indil]]'' ("lily, or other large single flower").<ref>{{HM|WJ}}, p. 399</ref>
==Examples==
* ''[[Inziladûn|'''Inzil'''adûn]]'' = "Flower of the West"
*''[[Inzilbêth|'''Inzil'''bêth]]'' = "Flower-word"
*''[[Rothinzil|Roth'''inzil''']]'' = "Foam-flower"
